contents: With an unwavering commitment to high-performance high-assurance software engineering, our founders Prof Karthikeyan Bhargavan, Dr Franziskus Kiefer, and Dr Jonathan Protzenko have a demonstrated track record of solving the most challenging problems. With a combined experience of over 40 years in the cryptography and formal methods space, the three co-founders are uniquely equipped to solve cryptographic challenges; starting from the design and analysis phase all the way to the production system.
title: The Team
